A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Overall one of my favorite movies but all of the metaphors make the story a bit hard to follow for the average viewer. That CGI Yoda was pretty cool though. The way that Luke dies is a bit stupid though. I feel like if he was chopped in half by Kylo Ren\, it would have been a more emotional\, tear raising moments in Star Wars history. Again\, one of my favorite movies\, has it's flaws.
